casebody.data:
No. 09-1233. Arnold Schwarzenegger, Governor of California, et al., Appellants v. Marciano Plata, et al. 562 U.S. 1056, 131 S. Ct. 631,

178 L. Ed. 2d 459,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9031. November 23, 2010.

Motion of J. Clark Kelso, Receiver for Medical Healthcare for the California State Prisons, for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae out of time granted.
